mapper.select: select b.basket_no, b.mno, m.mid, b.prdt_no, b.buy_qty, b.reg_date , p.prdt_no, p.prdt_name, p.mno, m2.mid, p.qty, p.price, p.discount , p.price - (p.price / 100 * p.discount) sale_price , ( p.price - (p.price / 100 * p.discount) ) * b.buy_qty total_price , p.description, p.view_cnt, p.reg_date , p.thumbnail_name, p.thumbnail_path, p.prdt_img_name, p.prdt_img_path , p.desc_img_name, p.desc_img_path, p.add_file_name, p.add_file_path from basket b, member m, product p, member m2 where b.mno = #{mno} and b.mno = m.mno and b.prdt_no = p.prdt_no and p.mno = m2.mno order by b.reg_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into basket (mno , prdt_no, buy_qty, reg_date) values(#{mno}, #{prdt_no}, #{buy_qty}, now())
